author: Ian Livingston
title: P.M. Update: Numerous clouds around through Tuesday as a cold front passes
description: The main impact of the front is to change the wind direction.
content:
The beat goes on. It was another mild day in the region, just like much like the month and winter overall. Highs were about 50 as morning sun gave way to increasing clouds during the afternoon. Well see more clouds than clear skies over the next day.
